Bash(PGPASSWORD='flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1' psql postgresql://postgres:flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1@db.bomltkhixeatxuoxmolq.supabase.co:5432/postgres -c "
SELECT

    column_default

WHERE table_name = ''personas'' 
ORDER BY ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1' psql postgresql://postgres:flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1@db.bomltkhixeatxuoxmolq.supabase.co:5432/postgres -c "
SELECT 
  r.slug,
  r.name,
  r.seniority_level,
  f.name as function_name,
  d.name as department_name
FROM org_roles r
LEFT JOIN org_functions f ON f.id = r.function_id
LEFT JOIN org_departments d ON d.id = r.department_id
WHERE r.tenant_id = ''11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111''
  AND r.is_active = true
ORDER BY f.name, r.seniority_level DESC, r.name;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1' psql postgresql://postgres:flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1@db.bomltkhixeatxuoxmolq.supabase.co:5432/postgres -c "
SELECT column_name 
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name = ''personas'' 
  AND column_name IN (
    ''years_in_current_role'', 
    ''years_in_industry'', 
    ''organization_type'', 
    ''geographic_scope'',
    ''work_style'',
    ''learning_style'',
    ''technology_adoption'',
    ''risk_tolerance'',
    ''change_readiness''
  )
ORDER BY column_name;
")

Bash(for table in persona_certifications persona_challenges persona_communication_channels persona_decision_makers persona_education persona_evidence_sources persona_frustrations persona_goals persona_motivations persona_organization_types persona_pain_points persona_personality_traits persona_quotes persona_responsibilities persona_success_metrics persona_tools persona_typical_day persona_typical_locations persona_values persona_vpanes_scoring)

Bash(PGPASSWORD='flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1' psql "postgresql://postgres:flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1@db.bomltkhixeatxuoxmolq.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "
SELECT column_name, data_type
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_name = ''personas''
  AND column_name NOT IN (''id'', ''tenant_id'', ''created_at'', ''updated_at'', ''deleted_at'')
ORDER BY ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1' psql postgresql://postgres:flusd9fqEb4kkTJ1@db.bomltkhixeatxuoxmolq.supabase.co:5432/postgres -c "
SELECT ua.*, a.id, a.name, a.description, a.capabilities, a.metadata, a.created_at, a.updated_at
FROM user_agents ua
LEFT JOIN agents a ON a.id = ua.agent_id
WHERE ua.user_id = ''1d85f8b8-dcf0-4cdb-b697-0fcf174472eb''
ORDER BY ua.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
")
